headline: Bully Atmosphere
pros: Opportunity to work in a lucrative career. You may or may not make “Wall Street” level compensation here but it’s a foot in the door to a buy side analyst position — most of whom are overpaid to the little value they add to investment returns
cons: What have you done for us today! We want 110% loyalty.

headline: Typical
pros: a bunch of nice people, but can be clique-ish
cons: low pay in operations. not much on the upside within operations

headline: Truly toxic environment
cons: I was thoroughly mistreated here. This place is full of backstabbing and office politicking and brown nosing, all of which comes from the top. It's dysfunctional. People either stay for their whole career or wise up after short time and get out.

headline: SVP Business Development
cons: very us culture not fitting for europe
